improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero error.  The value of x becomes 0 after the loop, leading to an error on line 12.  Add a check to prevent division by zero.

Unreachable code. The if condition (x > 0) will always be true until x becomes 0. When x equals 0, the if condition is false, so the y = 0 statement inside the if block will not execute. However, it might be a logic issue that causes x to become 0.

Performance improvement: The loop will always run 10 times. The calculation y = (1 / x) will cause an error. If the intention is to calculate only when x is not zero, additional logic is necessary to prevent that error.
